q1: Have you been completely vaccinated for COVID-19?
q2: Do you/they have fever or have you/they felt hot or feverish recently (14-21 days)?
q3: Are you/they having shortness of breath or other difficulties breathing?
q5: Any other flu-like symptoms, such as gastrointestinal upset, headache or fatigue?
q6: Have you/they experienced recent loss of taste or smell?
q7: Are you/they in contact with any confirmed COVID-19 positive patients?
q9: Do you/they have heart disease, lung disease, kidney disease, diabetes or any auto-immune disorders?
q10: Have you been tested positive to COVID-19?
q11: Have you/they traveled in the past 14 days outside your state of residence?
